member.name: M:System.Collections.Generic.AsyncEnumerator.MoveNext``1(System.Collections.Generic.IAsyncEnumerator{``0})
member.summary: Advances the enumerator to the next element in the sequence, returning the result asynchronously.
member.returns: Task containing the result of the operation: true if the enumerator was successfully advanced to the next element; false if the enumerator has passed the end of the sequence.

member.name: T:System.Collections.Generic.IAsyncEnumerable`1
member.summary: Asynchronous version of the IEnumerable<T> interface, allowing elements of the enumerable sequence to be retrieved asynchronously.

member.name: M:System.Collections.Generic.IAsyncEnumerable`1.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Gets an asynchronous enumerator over the sequence.
member.returns: Enumerator for asynchronous enumeration over the sequence.

member.name: T:System.Collections.Generic.IAsyncEnumerator`1
member.summary: Asynchronous version of the IEnumerator<T> interface, allowing elements to be retrieved asynchronously.

member.name: M:System.Collections.Generic.IAsyncEnumerator`1.MoveNext(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Advances the enumerator to the next element in the sequence, returning the result asynchronously.
member.param: Cancellation token that can be used to cancel the operation.
member.returns: Task containing the result of the operation: true if the enumerator was successfully advanced to the next element; false if the enumerator has passed the end of the sequence.

member.name: P:System.Collections.Generic.IAsyncEnumerator`1.Current
member.summary: Gets the current element in the iteration.
